channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Barclays shares hit nine-year high after third quarter profit jumps 23%, beating expectations
item.description: British bank Barclays on Thursday reported £1.6 billion ($2 billion) net profit attributable to shareholders for the third quarter, beating expectatio...

item.title: IBM stock slips on disappointing consulting and infrastructure revenue
item.description: IBM's critical software category performed well due to Red Hat's gains, but the consulting and infrastructure segments pulled down overall results.

item.title: Ex-Obama aide explains why Kamala Harris is losing Gen Z men to Donald Trump
item.description: Harris isn’t meeting young male voters where they are—or where they get their news: “This is what Trump is doing every day.”

item.title: Boeing machinists reject new labor contract, extending more than 5-week strike
item.description: Boeing machinists walked off the job on Sept. 13 after overwhelmingly rejecting an earlier proposal.

item.title: Boeing stock falls in premarket after pay deal rejected
Tesla says 'Model 2' is still on deck for 2025
North Carolina says it needs at least $53 billion to recover from Hurricane Helene damages
item.description: Gov. Roy Cooper said the state's previous record for storm damage was $17 billion from Hurricane Florence, which struck eastern North Carolina in 2018...

item.title: Donald Trump’s flip-flopping on early voting isn’t the only reason Republicans are flocking to the polls, election expert says
item.description: More working-class voters, who have historically preferred early voting, are turning red.

item.title: Want to cash in on the boom in robots? Analyst names 3 stocks to play the trend
item.description: Robots are witnessing a "new inflection point" and several global stocks are leading in a corner of the ecosystem, according to Bernstein.

item.title: The bullish breakout for Nvidia’s stock may have been a false alarm
Boeing factory workers vote to reject contract, will continue 6-week strike
Goldman Sachs-backed Simbe raises $50M in Series C funding to bolster retail robot business
item.description: Simbe is now working with 29 retail brands.

item.title: Seadrill stock jumps on report of talks with Transocean
Unilever sales growth accelerates under CEO’s overhaul plan
item.description: Revenue increased 4.5% in the third quarter, beating the 4.3% expected by analysts, the maker of soap and stock cubes said Thursday.

item.title: Nvidia supplier SK Hynix posts record quarterly profit as AI boom drives demand
item.description: Revenue for the third quarter grew about 94% year-on-year.
